name: SNG_Autoregister_Mac
short_description:
SNGAutoregister is a freeware Mac application that helps you to register automatically to PokerStars SitNGos.

You will be able to choose whether you want to play a determined number of table or for a fixed amount of time, and this software will autoregister you to SNGs for that period. You can even set how many tables you want to play at the same time up to 24 that represent the actual PokerStars limit.

Make sure to follow exactly these steps before you run the application:

1) Enable access for assistive devices: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23nxGSQ2JQ4

2) Log in into PokerStars and make sure you have a dialog box containing ONLY the SitNGo you want to play. An example is shown in the image below. This is critical because the app will register you to anything highlighted in the dialog box, so make sure you have only the SNG you want to play.
http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/156/immagine2dgp.png

When you're ready to go, double click on the application icon.
summary: Register to SNG automatically. Mac application for Pokerstars.
